title: Public Summary – Sussex Police Data Withholding & Safeguarding Breach
summary: This case involves the unlawful obstruction of a Subject Access Request (SAR) submitted by Ben Carter following a suicide attempt and ongoing safeguarding failures. The request, made on 8 April 2025, was ignored beyond the legal deadline, despite involving a known officer (PC Jon Dixon) and an IOPC complaint. The data sought included crucial safeguarding evidence. No response was provided by 3 June 2025.

key_events.event: Reminder sent, CC to PC Dixon and IOPC
No data provided; public accountability triggered

safeguarding_note: This SAR was tied to a suicide risk disclosure and withholding it may constitute a breach of safeguarding duties under UK law.
status: Released for public awareness and advocacy use
